programmes.show_description: This is Heart Dance playing the best non-stop Club Classics.
This is Heart Dance playing the best non-stop Club Classics.
Toby Anstis starts your day with non-stop Club Classics. Text DANCE to 82122 or follow @HeartDance on socials to get involved!
This is Heart Dance playing the best non-stop Club Classics.
Every day between 11am and 1pm. No interruptions, just 2 hours of the biggest Club Classics to get you dancing through the day!
